Browse the source code of netbsd/sys/external/bsd/compiler_rt/dist/lib/builtins/ctzdi2.c

1/* ===-- ctzdi2.c - Implement __ctzdi2 -------------------------------------===
2 *
3 * The LLVM Compiler Infrastructure
4 *
5 * This file is dual licensed under the MIT and the University of Illinois Open
6 * Source Licenses. See LICENSE.TXT for details.
7 *
8 * ===----------------------------------------------------------------------===
9 *
10 * This file implements __ctzdi2 for the compiler_rt library.
11 *
12 * ===----------------------------------------------------------------------===
13 */
14
15#include "int_lib.h"
16
17/* Returns: the number of trailing 0-bits */
18
19#if !defined(__clang__) && (defined(__sparc64__) || defined(__mips64))
20/* gcc resolves __builtin_ctz -> __ctzdi2 leading to infinite recursion */
21#define __builtin_ctz(a) __ctzsi2(a)
22extern si_int __ctzsi2(si_int);
23#endif
24
25/* Precondition: a != 0 */
26
27COMPILER_RT_ABI si_int
28__ctzdi2(di_int a)
29{
30 dwords x;
31 x.all = a;
32 const si_int f = -(x.s.low == 0);
33 return __builtin_ctz((x.s.high & f) | (x.s.low & ~f)) +
34 (f & ((si_int)(sizeof(si_int) * CHAR_BIT)));
35}
36
